summary: An Ordinance ordering the refunding to M. L. Ash of the amount paid by her on June 28, 1909, for the East ten (E. 10) feet of lots six (6), seven (7) and eight (8), Block twenty-four (24), Hillman's Division of Green Lake, in the Meadow Place, et al, condemnation sale under Ordinance No. 15924, which lots ought not to have been sold, and ordering the City Treasurer to cancel the entry of said sale and payment from said Meadow Place, et al, roll, and declaring an emergency.
